column4: I installed my JDK (JRE with compilers) from http://ubuntuguide.org instructions, using ubuntu-backports.mirrormax.net
hmm, i still haven't installed java... alternatively you could just set esd to give up the dsp device when nothing is using it (like, start esd w/ 'esd -as 5' or something like that)
I think I came in half way through the convo: I just thought you wanted Java, I didn't read the backlog ;)
